original_text:
“I also withheld rain from you
    when the harvest was still three months away.
I sent rain on one town,
    but withheld it from another.
One field had rain;
    another had none and dried up.
korean_text: 또 추수하기 석 달 전에 내가 너희에게 비를 멈추게 하여 어떤 성읍에는 내리고 어떤 성읍에는 내리지 않게 하였더니 땅 한 부분은 비를 얻고 한 부분은 비를 얻지 못하여 말랐으매

sentences.original_text: I also withheld rain from you
when the harvest was still three months away
sentences.korean_translation: 수확까지 아직 세 달이 남았을 때

sentences.original_text: I sent rain on one town

sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 다른 동네에는 비를 보내지 않았다

sentences.original_text: another had none and dried up
